members.joinCircumstances: Mr. 2 Bon Kurei is revealed as an Officer Agent of Baroque Works, dispatched to eliminate Mr. 3.
Akumai is revealed as a Billions agent serving under Mr. 2 Bon Kurei.

keyMoments.title: Mr. 2 Bon Kurei Revealed
keyMoments.description: Mr. 2 Bon Kurei is introduced as an Officer Agent of Baroque Works, showing the organization's hierarchy and ruthless nature.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals another powerful member of Baroque Works and shows how the organization handles failure.

keyMoments.title: Mr. 2 Sent to Eliminate Mr. 3
keyMoments.description: Baroque Works dispatches Mr. 2 to Little Garden to assassinate Mr. 3 for his failure and false report.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the brutal hierarchy within Baroque Works where failure is punished by death.
